text: This is a list of diseases of croton (Codiaeum variegatum) plants. ==Bacterial diseases== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=2| Bacterial diseases |- |Common name ||Scientific name |- |Crown gall ||Agrobacterium tumefaciens |- |} ==Fungal diseases== {| class="wikitable" style="clear" ! colspan=2| Fungal diseases |- |Common name ||Scientific name |- |Anthracnose ||Glomerella cingulata |- |Bacterial leaf spot ||Xanthomonas campestris |- |Stem gall and canker ||Nectriella pironii Kutilakesa pironii [anamorph] |- |} ==References== *Common Names of Diseases, The American Phytopathological Society Croton diseases
title: List of Croton diseases
